ovdesc.p: IS.MUSH.PARAM is the parameter table to define the Musharaka product related features.

desc.p: Category that will be used to reference Musharaka Receivables Account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
The transation code that will be used while raising Musharaka entries.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table TRANSACTION.
Contains all the override messages which the user has confirmed during input.

During Commit, the system may generate a series of screen override messages waiting for User Approval. If the record is subsequently displayed or printed, all override messages are shown in this field.
Validation Rules:
System generated. Multi-value field.
The PL category to which Musharaka Profit is accounted.
This PL category is debited while paying profit to the Musharaka Customer(s).
Validation Rules:
1. Valid PL Category ranging from 50000 to 69999.
Category that will be used to refer Musharaka Bank share Account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
Category that will be used to refer Musharaka Account. This account is used to debit Musharaka customer's sharing portion.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
The maximum sharing percentage that is allowed for the Musharaka customers.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid percentage (less than 100).
The description about the Islamic Product.
Validation Rules:
1. Mandatory Input.
2. Standard T24 Alphanumeric field.
Category that will be used to refer Musharaka Incentive Account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
The PL category that is used to credit musharaka incentive amount.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid PL Category ranging from 50000 to 69999.
The ID of the application IS.MUSH.PARAM is any standard text. The field is a Standard T24 alphanumeric type.
Category that will be used to refer Musharaka Customer Account in LC Financing.
The Financing customer must have an account in this category while creating Musharaka type of LC.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
The percentage of management fee to be taken before crediting the musharaka profit to the customers.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid percentage (less than 100).
